channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Noise waking residents up, 6th November
item.description:
This drain when driven over makes noise it never used to needs attention waking people up in the night
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 27, Armstrong Road, Stoke Orchard, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Green man symbol does on illuminated on central control box., 6th November
item.description:
Green man above the pedestrian button does not illuminate when the crossing across the main road is active. Appears the backlight is faulty.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Princess Elizabeth Way, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes still there despite saying fixed, 6th November
item.description:
There are a series of potholes as you drive up Birdlip hill. Drivers have the option of hitting oncoming traffic or hitting potholes with their left tyres. Previous report say they have been repaired, but this is not the case. These particular potholes are on and around the 40 mph road signs.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Way, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large patch of repaired road breaking down again. 1 metre square?, 6th November
item.description:
Ref 6563686 A417 Corinium Avenue just before the bridge where lorries turn out. Reported on 7th Oct and I reported it again on Oct 21st as it was urgent. You emailed me that it had been repaired on Oct 25th. Travelling that way again last night I see that the repair is breaking down again. It must be the large lorries turning out onto the A417 at that point that are pulling up the tarmac. Please can you check again. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Corinium Avenue, Barnwood, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Temporary Ramp has come loose from mounting stakes., 5th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Oldfield Crescent, Hatherley, Cheltenham
